marginalplot 0.0.1

Postprocess Output of marginal()

Source: R/postprocess.R
postprocess.Rd

This function offers different ways to improve the output of marginal(), partial_dependence(), average_observed().

postprocess(object, ...)

# Default S3 method
postprocess(object, ...)

# S3 method for class 'marginal'
postprocess(
  object,
  cat_drop_below_n = 0,
  cat_drop_below_prop = 0,
  cat_explicit_na = TRUE,
  na.rm = FALSE,
  ...
)

# S3 method for class 'multimarginal'
postprocess(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object of class "marginal" or "multimarginal".

...

Currently unused.

cat_drop_below_n

Drop categories with exposure below this value.

cat_drop_below_prop

Drop categories with relative exposure below this value.

cat_explicit_na

Should NA levels in categoricals be converted to strings?

na.rm

Should NA levels be dropped?

Methods (by class)

  • postprocess(default): Default method.

  • postprocess(marginal): Method for "marginal" object.

  • postprocess(multimarginal): Method for "multimarginal" object.
